name: Test The Med
description:
The theme of the Weekly Game Jam which is "Dying is Awarded". 

You had signed up for a death trial, Dr. Little has found a mysterious Antibiotic and has decided to test it out with you. Your body will be loaded with an unbelievable amount of Bacteria which will kill you but the test will see how strong this Antibiotic can take. Survive as long as possible. In the end, it's a win for everyone.
